au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.primitive

Class RoleFilteredAcl

  • java.lang.Object
    • au.edu.uts.eng.remotelabs.rigclient.rig.primitive.RoleFilteredAcl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPrimitiveAcl

    public class RoleFilteredAcl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPrimitiveAcl
    Implementation of primitve control access control class which filters access to actions for slave roles based on action control lists. The following list shows how access is determined on a per role basis:
    • Master - The master user has implicit access to all actions.
    • Slave Active - Slave active users have explicit access to the actions in the slave active access control list and inherited access from the slave passive access control list.
    • Slave Passive - Slave passive users have explicit access to only the actions in the slave passive access control list.
    To set up access, populate the lists slaveActiveActions and slavePassiveActions with the names of actions (not including the 'Action' method name suffix) for setting access for slave active and slave passive roles respectively.
